"The goal of this game is to spin your phone 
" "on your finger or on a flat surface 
" "(screen facing up) as many times as you can!

" "This screen is single player mode.
" "Your spins here are recorded globally
" "so you are competing against the world!

" "In single player mode, the game ends if
" "you either drop the phone or if it stops 
" "spinning for more than 2 seconds!
"

"This takes you to 2 player mode.
" "Bluetooth Brawl is a 2 player spin-off
" "where the player with more spins wins.

" "Additionally, you can swipe to get there
" "instead of pressing the button"

"Welcome to Bluetooth Brawl!
" "The goal here is to get more spins than
" "the other player.

" "To connect to another player, one of you
" "must search and the other must be found.

" "To search, press the visible bluetooth
" "button on the actionbar. The other player
" "must make their device discoverable by
" "clicking "Make discoverable" in the settings.
" "You can also choose the length of time which
" "your device stays discoverable."

"You can pick from 5 different game modes:
" "Each higher level decreases the amount of
" "time you have to spin. The options are:
" "unlimited, 10s, 5s, 2.5s, and 1.5s

" "Click on this icon to change difficulties
" "This can only be done by the player who
" "initiates a brawl."

"This takes you to the Leaderboard.
" "It contains the global ranking of all players
" "ranked by highest score.
" "You can also swipe to get to this screen.

" "Check to see where you stand in the rankings!"

"This takes you to the Friends List.
" "You can subscribe to other players, which
" "adds them to your friends list. From here,
" "you can see their score and number of wins."
